string.name: default_notification_channel_name
string.defintion: This is the name users will see under Android system settings for app notifications. It should describe the category of notifications that will be sent through this channel.

resources.string: Be careful, changing this will cause the player to be added and removed from the appropriate groups based on their new allegiance. Note that if a player is already human and you set them to human again THEY WILL GET A ADDITIONAL LIFECODE. That means a zombie can still redeem their old lifecode and get points but this player will stay human. Players are human until ALL of their lifecodes are claimed. Setting a zombie to be a zombie does nothing. Weird things could happen if you set a player to be undeclared; maybe it will be fine and maybe it will break?
